Equipment Actions.Action 1: Scourge, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Piercing plus 17 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Drow Priestess makes 2 Scourge attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Summon Demon, The Drow Priestess summons a Yochlol in an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Fey Ancestry, The Drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can not put the Drow to sleep
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Drow can innately cast a few spells, requiring no material components
Abilities.Ability 3: Spellcasting, The Drow Priestess is a 10th level spellcaster, with a number of Cleric spells prepared
Abilities.Ability 4: Sunlight Sensitivity, The Drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight while in Sunlight
